abstrac: Providing people solutions so you can focus on your business!
bio: Results-driven Human Resources Professional with progressive HR and leadership experience in providing innovative HR solutions for small to medium-sized organizations. Proven communicator with a strong commitment to service and a history of partnering in the development and implementation of HR strategies to achieve business results. Expertise in employee relations, performance management, Federal (multi-state) and California legal compliance, and workplace investigations. Development of policies and procedures, employee handbooks, and various training programs including Sexual Harassment Prevention (AB1825), recruitment & hiring, and disciplinary action.

Hours of operation are Monday through Friday, 7 a.m. to 5 p.m. (PST)
Preferred method of communication is email
Preferred method of payment is via PayPal or Certified Check

abstrac: Creator or engaging Learning Content and Training Materials
bio:
Under my own Ltd Company (Suit-the-Case Training Ltd.) I have worked with small-to-medium businesses to improve there internal and commercial learning and development offering.
Learners are at the heart of learning & development services, ensuring that your business meets the changing demands in any industry. Drawing on nearly a decade of experience Learning and Development including work across international BPO call centres and travel retail I can assist you to:
- Instructional Design of eLearning using Articulate 360 
- Instructional Design of facilitator-led training
- Construct and manage employee engagement programmes
- Create Competency Frameworks 
- Performance Management 
- Sales Coaching
- Analyse the development needs of your business
- Design, Development and Implement Training Programmes 
- Evaluate current and new learning initiatives
- Providing high-impact workshop facilitation

- Scope and timeframes will be provided at time of quote acceptance, it is provided on the understanding of goodwill and will not be shared with competitors of Suit-the-Case Training Ltd. without express consent.
- All quotations provide will remain valid, for up to 60 days. 
- An upfront payment will be requested of upto 50% to be held in Escrow by Guru.com prior to commencement of Service 
- All other milestone deliverables will need to be paid within 28 days of delivery
- Quotes do not include consultant travel expenses, travel will be undertaken subject to agreement with all parties and responsibility for travel related expenditure will be outlined in the Service Contract.
- Work which fall outside the remit of the initial scopt e.g. additional Instructional Design will be charged at an hourly rate.

Please message me through guru.com if you are interested in hiring me. I am also available on Skype, should you wish to discuss further, please message me with an expression of interest and I will provide these further contact details.

Apollo Creative Solution is a World Eminent Business (WEB) Solution for all your needs. We completely understand the changing needs of our clients and improve overall bundled results that surpass desires.
